network_overview: The trace shows a 3-hour control-plane snapshot with healthy SCTP associations carrying S1-AP, Diameter and M3UA/SS7 signalling; no GTP-U tunnels, RTP or SIP were observed, so user-plane or IMS traffic is not visible at this point.

observations.finding: All GTPv2-C Create-Bearer requests (msg 0x31) return cause 128 (unknown) with zero successful responses
Diameter commands 318/316/324/317 all receive result-code 2001 (DIAMETER_SUCCESS) without any failure or retransmission
observations.evidence: 18x 2001 answers for each command, no errors or timeouts

observations.finding: S1-AP Proc-11/13/23 exchanges occur regularly with no cause codes or failure indications
observations.evidence: 144 Proc-11 and 108 Proc-13 messages, zero error causes

root_causes.description: Every observed Create-Bearer Request (GTPv2-C msg 0x31) is answered with cause 128 (vendor-specific/unknown) instead of a normal success or 3GPP-defined rejection
root_causes.impact: Prevents dedicated-bearer establishment for VoLTE or data services

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SIP, RTP, or IMS AKA traffic observed
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Mirror on P-CSCF or capture SGi interface to see SIP/RTP

inconclusive_aspects.reason: GTP-U tunnels (0 present) and user-plane frames are absent
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on S1-U or S5/S8 user-plane links

inconclusive_aspects.reason: Response contains only cause value 128 without further Information Element
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: GTP-C logs from S-GW or P-GW to map vendor cause 128

recommendations.action: Investigate S-GW/P-GW logs for vendor-specific meaning of GTP-C cause 128 and rectify bearer-setup failures
recommendations.rationale: All 8 Create-Bearer attempts fail with the same undocumented cause, blocking services that need dedicated bearers

recommendations.action: Collect simultaneous user-plane capture on S1-U/S5-U to confirm whether any traffic is forwarded despite control-plane rejections
recommendations.rationale: Bearer-setup failure may still leave default bearer; user-plane visibility will clarify service impact

recommendations.action: Enable detailed GTP-C tracing to capture full Information Elements in failed responses
recommendations.rationale: Additional IEs (e.g. 'Offending IE') would pinpoint whether QoS, APN-AMBR or TFT is rejected

session_analysis.signaling_health: SCTP associations stable, Diameter success 100 %, S1-AP procedures without error; only GTP-C bearer-setup shows systematic rejection
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U tunnels observed; user-plane health not measurable from this capture
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable - no RTP or SIP present
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Cannot correlate user-plane with signaling because user-plane is absent in trace

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant eNB
    participant MME
    participant SGW
    participant PGW
    participant HSS
    Note over eNB,HSS: Only control-plane shown
    eNB->>MME: S1-AP Proc-11 (UE-associated)
    MME->>HSS: Diameter Cmd-318 (Update-Location)
    HSS-->>MME: 2001 OK
    MME->>SGW: GTPv2-C Create-Bearer Req (0x31)
    SGW-->>MME: Cause 128 (failure)
    MME->>eNB: S1-AP Proc-13 (context release)
    Note right of MME: Bearer setup fails repeatedly
